attributes.additional_details: The elected, in Government and Opposition have been a shambles and an unmitigated disaster in the last few weeks. The evidence has been shown in all aspects of the Media, any bias will have been accounted for in the mass of editorials available and shown.
attributes.background:
Our present system is outdated and not fit for purpose, it should be far easier to replace an MP and MEP who are not performing.
Indeed, why elect at all when unelected tell the elected what to do?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "disband Members of Parliament."

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the change you would like to see happen.
